Feels like it's turned into a money grab anymore, Mass inflated skin market, free to play model allows a lot more hackers to play in casual or death match with little moderation. Even in comp games its mostly games with smurfs or hackers no matter what rank you play at. They changed the rank weighting a few years ago making the top level of each grouping hard to get out of because mostly smurfs sit at it, I've played games with LEM's and nova masters having just as difficult a time in each grouping. There's not really a clear cut skill rank at the ranks. Used to be a 7/10 game now its scratching at 2/10 but hey just release more skins and get that loot box (case) money from impressionable kiddos.

Counter-Strike: Global Offensive is by far the best game available in the world. It's as simple as that. Like there's no other game that can compete with what it brings to the table. Memes, highlights, memories and more is what this game can bring to anyone who plays it.
FANTASTIC! I will never stop playing this well thought out game!
